restart eclipse,it works.
So it seems a bug of viewer.

This problem actually is exited always. The problem is: when starting the application, viewer should set the classpath key the system. But the old viewer didn't have the correct logic to get the right classpath value. The deisgner debug project use the same classpath key with viewer. So, designer set the classpath value to the system when start up,  and Engine can get the correct classpath by the key. But if user create a java project after the application start up, this project will not be included in the classpath. 

To fix this, firstly, we need Viewer to change the right algorithm to get the correct classpath value. And then Designer debuger plugin need to change to use another classpath key. This need multi-team discussion and to see if that will cause other problem. Suggest to schedule to after 2.2.
Restart eclipse will resolve this issue, so remove smoke

When createURI and set URL in browser to preview report, refresh workspace class path and set it to System Property.
If launch report debug, the workspace class path is set by debug ui plugin.
If not, it is reset by viewer plugin.
Fix will cause RCP build failed. Reverse fix and reopen it.
Refer to "org.eclipse.birt.report.debug.ui" bundle API to refresh workspace classpath.
